Reviews.Content: hotel historic building central location 5 min piazza navona pantheon triple spacious ceilings comfortable clean bathroom roomy clean street facing shutters thick windows kept street noise minimum ear plugs beds comfortable daughter loved daybed hotel front desk staff proffessional helpful called taxis day breakfast served level dining breakfast adequate cappuccino ham cheese juices pastries fresh fruit cereals habit returning hotel afternoon siesta dinner restaurants nearby hotel tiziano restful respite bustle rome value money

Reviews.Content: selected hotel location near pantheon decision located busy street noisy family 2 kids smelly leak bathroom smelly fridge breakfast basic rome hotel standards appear low difficult money definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “True Italian hospitality and a great escape from the cold Nordics”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times own rome business kids time teenagers friends weekend getaways location probably rome walking distance lobby beautiful nice comfortable beds nice bathrooms makes hotel unique people people 10 ago tells feels extended home hotel sent sweden didnt fit bag sent free stuff arrived day dont hotel cant wait

Reviews.Content: found tiziano attractive comfortable assets central location extraordinary service walk rome including trevi fountain piazza di navona pantheon etc walk attractions including vatican staff provide service goes extra mile example willing breakfast hour taking excursions willing look postcards addressed correctly mailing special luncheon hotel excellent usually serve luncheon meals dining special meals served attractive extraordinarily positive experiece

Reviews.Content: hotel location favorite spots walking distance campo di fiori piazza di navona forum colleseum etc front desk helpful issue shower water temperature scolding hot freezing cold control didnt tell front desk fixed overall experience

Reviews.Title: “Location, location. location”
Reviews.Author: ElienTelAviv
Reviews.Content: hotel perfectly located clean inspite somewhat modest interiors lack dining amazing value short stay especially able walk position city public transport short distances taxi vatican tour ancient rome corner pantheon amazing variety mind computer internet charge internet acess

Reviews.Title: “No 4 star hotel!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights september extremely 3 people beds literally space crawl bed middle bed bathroom dated serious upgrading tiles chipped patched hook cupboard door coming hinges etc walls bedroom marked curtains filthy dark breakfast tablecloths holes rush getting coffee afternoon concierge extremely helpful evening gentleman morning staff chatting helpful plus location excellent minutes walk front pantheon lots restaurants shopping walking distance trevi spanish steps linens towels clean lots hotels vicinity try someplace else time

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: hstaunton1
Reviews.Content: ok star rating feel rating 4 star italian hotel compare uk standard assume hotel 3 star decor fashioned huge fresh linen bedding changed daily air conditioning superb lovely cold marble floor help cool hot burning feet walk bed absolutely massive 4 superb nights uninterrupted sleep refreshed morning raring downside huge en suite shower honest inside shower power shower superb tiziano superb staff fantastic location unparalleled fantastic deal 700 eur complaints whatsoever

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in an excellant location.”
Reviews.Author: Nicole040
Reviews.Content: stayed 40th bday bit disappointed wasnt cleanest moved overlooking main street watch action staff helpfull breakfast unfortunatley wasnt little choice left late eat excellant location rome foot 10 mins restaurants pair walking shoes walked 12 miles day getting bus etc found remember vatican closed sundays restaurants directly navona expensive venture streets authentic atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “Overall - very satisfied.”
Reviews.Author: CheshireRockFan
Reviews.Content: actually booked palace received notice days due fly able accommodate alternative hotel tiziano feared worst im fears laid rest arrived hotel hotel smart throughout absolutely fine size single traveler bathroom clean location hotel vittorio emmanuelle ii ideal vittoriano short walk south east hotel beyond forum colisseum 10 minute walk north pantheon couple blocks west piazzo 10 minutes north river bank castel st angelo st peters major thoroughfare easy vittorio hotel staff front desk friendly real quibble lack fruit juice morning orange cordial available pretty poor frankly summary recommend hotel stay youre planning visit rome try deal via site comparison web site

Reviews.Title: “great location and pleasant service”
Reviews.Author: AGA55
Reviews.Content: nice option short stay location wonderful price bad breakfast simple fresh nicely staff makes fresh coffee opinion coffee shops city weakness hotel beds overall definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, good hotel”

Reviews.Content: location couldnt walk center rome footsore buses nearby helpful desk staff respond transportation questions hotel maintained ship shape air conditioning perfect satellite tv internet handy perfectly quiet suppose street experience traffic noise center busy city expect silence overlook street nice breakfast buffet couldnt happier hotel kudos friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Great location - that's about it”
Reviews.Author: NewtravelerHawaii
Reviews.Content: perfect location walking distance major sites shopping restaurants hotel ok relatively clean incredibly european hotels bare minimum furnishings worth price breakfast buffet nice selection fruits cereal breads staff warm helpful fairly sleeping showering

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Location –very descent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Onyx1968
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel tiziano 4 nights bb deal hotel clean comfortable it’s located busy street corso emanuelle 2nd quit comfortable feature location tiziano minutes walking distance rome pizza restaurants shopping pharmacy supermarket 1 minute public transportation variety bus lines outside preferred walk landmarks centro storico colloseum 20 min easy walk breakfast filling assortment cereals cakes fresh fruits juices regular ham cheese don’t eat cause dietary restrictions coffee freshly definitely recommend friends drawback charged 5 euro 24 hours wireless internet

Reviews.Title: “Great location, terrible service”
Reviews.Author: justinstelter
Reviews.Content: possibly worst service desk service ive received cant complain else hotel ruined overall experience gentlemen jan 22nd feb 3rd guy terse unhelpful plainly rude hope service
